import java.util.*;

public class Graph {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
	System.out.println("Enter number of nodes");
	int n = sc.nextInt();
	
	System.out.println("Enter number of edges");
	int e = sc.nextInt();
	
	int adj[][] = new int[n][n];
	
    // take edges as input
	for(int i = 0; i<e;i++) {
		int u = sc.nextInt();
		int v = sc.nextInt();
		
		adj[u][v] = 1;
	}
	
    // print graph
	for(int row[]: adj) {
		for(int vertex : row) {
			System.out.print(vertex + " ");
		}
		System.out.println();
	}
	
	
	
	sc.close();
		
	}

}
